extendedInfo.description: Animations now available!!TacticalPad, the world famous sports board app, now available for Basketball! TacticalPad is the most complete tool for coaches, assistant coaches, performance analyst, journalists and sport enthusiasts. Easy to use, agile, together with Tablets' and Smartphones' mobility, TacticalPad is the best option for professionals to improve their communication, resulting in better understanding in tactical discussions. TacticalPad targets every level, from amateur to professional, from youth development to high level. It is a competitive advantage, assisting technical staff to study and surprise opponents. TacticalPad is not only used by technical staff, but also by journalists, bloggers, teachers and sport enthusiasts. Because of its high quality graphics, it is widely used to generate content for blogs, social networks, lectures, newspapers, etc. Check below some features and scenarios that make TacticalPad so powerful: â¢ Projects with multiple tactical boards â¢ Support animated playsâ¢ High quality graphics â¢ Use it in the bench, pre-match presentation, training sessions, half time talks, daily chats, home, etc. Use it anytime and anywhere. â¢ Digital ink support: - Free drawing - Lines - Arrows - Dashed - Configurable color and thicknes - Eraser â¢ Trainning items â¢ Export content to: - Images - Emails - Facebook â¢ Supports itunes file sharing â¢ Project to a TV or projectorâ¢ Team roster settings with: - Names - Number - Positions - Lineups â¢ Teams and playersâ appearances: - Colors - Badge - Jersey style â¢ Save and load teams â¢ Settings to show/hide playersâ name and number------------------------------------------------------------keywords:basketball, basquete, baloncesto, prancheta, lebron, drills, board, tactics, tactical, coach, Heat

reviews.title: Very Good!!
reviews.comment: An excellent app for android and for coaches.
reviews.author: Allan Arroyo

reviews.title: Not bad - PRO version a bit pricey
reviews.comment: Like the application alot - can take a couple of presses though before buttons work
